instruction.value: PRE-OP Induction
Administer 30 minutes pre-chemotherapy.
for 3 doses POST_CHEMOTHERAPY.

DAY 1 of 7. May be administered by PO route.

DAYS 1, 2 & 3 of 21. May be administered by PO route.

DAY 1 of 28. May be administered by PO route.

DAY 8 of 28. May be administered by PO route.

DAY 1 of 21. Administer pre-chemotherapy.
DAY 4 of 21. Administer pre-chemotherapy.
DAY 1 of 21. for nausea. May be administered by PO route.

DAY -1. Administer pre-chemotherapy. May be administered by PO route.
DAY -1. For 3 days, starting the evening of chemotherapy. May be administered by PO route.
DAY 2. May be administered by PO route.
DAY 0. Administer 30 minutes pre-transplant. May be administered by PO route.
DAY 0. Administer 60 minutes pre-transplant. May be administered by PO route.

additionalnotes.value: Initiate order following completion of ondansetron 8 mg PO/IV Q8h x 3 days.
